text:
Charles - build your own install media. 
https://github.com/OSDeploy/OSDBuilder
https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/OSDBuilder/23.2.21.1 
Been using this for 4 odd years, works great. My suggestion is build tasks, then
execute the task to build the install media. I include language packs and other
localisations, I prefer my MS Paint to have coloUrs, not colors... ;)
%40googlegroups.com

metadata.topic: Re: This is a "digest this - this is not going to be fun" patch
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Re: This is a "digest this - this is not going to be fun" patch
